summary: Build a viral, Instagram-reels-style interactive Valentine proposal web page with two screens: an initial question screen with playful cursor-following chat bubbles and a second celebration screen after clicking Yes, featuring smooth romantic animations and mobile-friendly design.
architectural_notes: Two-page interactive web flow: initial question screen (no No button) and post-Yes celebration screen with animated transition.
UX behavior: playful rotating chat-bubble messages appear near cursor on hesitation or off-button clicks; keep Yes button prominent/clickable.
Visual design: soft pink gradient background, floating hearts animation, smooth fade + hearts burst transition, mobile-first layout.
